menu.enter_code: Enter the game code to join:
menu.press_to_create: Press %s to create a new game
menu.press_to_join: Press %s to join an existing game

board.waiting_for_start: Waiting for the host to start the game...

crew_abilities.aponi: If your rolling pool is 1-3 dice, each %reactor% or %wild% locked this roll is treated as 2 %reactors%.
crew_abilities.at-ok: If you roll 2+ %shields% you cannot bust on your next roll.
crew_abilities.avari: If you roll all %wilds%, gain 3 dice for your next roll.
crew_abilities.b3ar: If you roll 3+ %thrusters% finish the current requirement.
crew_abilities.bill: If you roll exactly 1 %shield% you may lock it as %wild%.
crew_abilities.drumbrage: If your rolling pool is 1-3 dice, each %damage% or %wild% locked this roll is treated as 2 %damage%.
crew_abilities.ft1000: If you roll exactly 1 %wild%, you may treat it as %extra%.
crew_abilities.imdar: If you roll no %shields% you may draw 1 %hazard%.
crew_abilities.kal: Your rolling pool starts with 6 dice.
crew_abilities.kary: Any %damage% from your first roll may be treated as %extra%.
crew_abilities.lee: If you roll exactly 1 %reactor% you may lock it as %wild%.
crew_abilities.lila: If you roll 2+ %reactors% you may re-roll any number of dice.
crew_abilities.meg: 1 %wild% from your first roll may be saved for your next roll.
crew_abilities.moro: If your pool is 1-3 dice, you cannot bust if you roll at least one %extra%.
crew_abilities.myla: If you roll 2+ %thrusters% you may treat 1 of your dice as %extra%.
crew_abilities.redacted: If your rolling pool is 1-3 dice, each %shield% or %wild% locked this roll is treated as 2 %shields%.
crew_abilities.ryan: If you roll 2+ %damage%, roll 2 supply dice and keep any that are %wild%.
crew_abilities.saghari: If you roll no %damage%, roll 1 supply die and keep if %wild% or %extra%.
crew_abilities.salatar: If you roll no %reactors% you may re-roll 2 dice.
crew_abilities.sella: If you roll exactly 1 %extra% you may lock it as %wild%.
crew_abilities.sol: If your rolling pool is 1-3 dice, each %thruster% or %wild% locked this roll is treated as 2 %thrusters%.
crew_abilities.tantin: If you roll exactly 1 %damage% you may lock it as %wild%.
crew_abilities.vanta: If you roll no %extra% you may lock any 1 die as %wild%.
crew_abilities.vila: If you roll no %reactors% you may re-roll 2 dice.
crew_abilities.zek: If you roll exactly 1 %thruster% you may lock it as %wild%.
